actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 96-26.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the committee print entitled "Study on Federal Regulation, Framework for Regulation, Appendix to Volume VI" as a Senate document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of the Committee on Governmental Affairs committee print entitled "Study on Federal Regulation, Framework for Regulation, Appendix to Volume VI" as a Senate document. Directs the printing of 450 additional copies for the use of such committee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the committee print entitled "Study on Federal Regulation, Framework for Regulation, Appendix to Volume VI" as a Senate document.
